[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@nextbnb/common](./common.md)

## common package

`@nextbnb/common` is a package containing the interfaces and functions to validate the interface that can be utilized in other packages.

## Remarks

Interfaces have a prefix of 'I'

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ApiError](./common.apierror.md) | Blueprint for the ApiError |
|  [BaseError](./common.baseerror.md) | Blueprint for the BaseError which will be extended by other specific errors |
|  [Experience](./common.experience.md) | Class to create the Experience instance |
|  [UnauthorizedError](./common.unauthorizederror.md) | Customized error to be thrown when the user tries to perform an authorized action |

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [HttpMethods](./common.httpmethods.md) | List of all the HTTP methods |
|  [Service](./common.service.md) | List of all the Services |

|  [isUser(arg)](./common.isuser.md) | Checks whether a given value is an [IUser](./common.iuser.md) |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IApiError](./common.iapierror.md) | Interface for the ApiError class |
|  [IBaseError](./common.ibaseerror.md) | Interface for the BaseError instance |
|  [IBaseErrorConstructor](./common.ibaseerrorconstructor.md) | Interface for constructing the BaseError instance |
|  [IContext](./common.icontext.md) | Interface of the Context |
|  [IExperience](./common.iexperience.md) | An experience posted by the user |
|  [IHost](./common.ihost.md) | Interface for the Host |
|  [IHostConstructor](./common.ihostconstructor.md) | Params to be passed to create the Host instance |
|  [IRole](./common.irole.md) | Interface of the serviceRoles property in Context |
|  [IStay](./common.istay.md) | A stay posted by the user |
|  [IUnauthorizedError](./common.iunauthorizederror.md) | Interface for the IUnauthorizedError instance |
|  [IUser](./common.iuser.md) | A user |
